1.summary: Completed JavaScript-Based Web Development Training Program
1.description: Throughout the course, I primarily worked on assignments and coding tests through pair programming. At the end of the program, I collaborated with my teammates to complete both a semi-project and a final project.

2.summary: Completed Java-Based Full-Stack Development Training Program
2.description: In the curriculum, I solved daily assignments on the topics learned each day and conducted semi-projects with my team at the end of each subject to review the material. Additionally, I completed a final project at the conclusion of the program.
